rules_text:
Menace
Nourish 1 [i](When this creature enters, put a +1/+1 counter on it or create a colorless Food artifact token with “{2}, {T}, Sacrifice this artifact: You gain 3 life.”)[/i]
At the beginning of combat on your turn, if you gained and/or lost life this turn, put a +1/+1 counter on Blighted Barkhide. [i](Damage causes loss of life.)[/i]
notes:
New card — replaced Greaseskithur

Slime counters have been replaced, freeing up this slot for another nourish card
